document.full_text: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori is virtually tied with left-wing former army officer ollanta humala a week before peru's june 5 presidential run-off, a poll by survey firm ipsos showed on sunday.
document.title: peru's presidential race nearly tied: ipsos poll
lines_and_colors: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori is virtually tied with left-wing former army officer ollanta humala a week before peru's june 5 presidential run-off, a poll by survey firm ipsos showed on sunday.
